entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
